outdir = Path(tempfile.mkdtemp())
detailed_report_list = bt.bulk_sample_typing(indir=test_data_dir, outdir=
    outdir, database=test_database, keep_blast=False)
report_dict = cs.build_report_dict(targets=detailed_report_list)
database_files = ty.get_database_files(database=test_database)
database_file = database_files[0]
outfile = cs.write_fasta(database_file=database_file, outdir=outdir,
    report_dict=report_dict)
assert outfile.exists()
shutil.rmtree(outdir)
